import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faHandsClapping } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './styles/blog.css' function TechBlogPage(props){ console.log(props.data.allTech.length) let {id}=useParams(); window.location.reload(); return(

{id}

{props.data.allTech.filter(items=>items.title===id).map(items=>(

{items.content}

{items.category} 1.1K likes
))}

Written By:

{props.data.blogOwner}

{props.data.allTech.filter(items=>items.title===id).map(items=>(

{items.date}

))}

More on Siren!

{props.data.recentTech.map(items=>(

{items.title}

{props.data.blogOwner}

{items.date}

))}
) } export default TechBlogPage;
